thag20.1:11.2: Duggandhakaraṃ → duggandhakaṃ (s2, s3) | duggandhaṃ (pts1), paribandhaṃ → parivajjeyya (s2, s3) | kariparibandha (pts1)
thag20.1:55.1: Majjhesarasmiṃ → ... sarassa (bj, pts2) | ... sāgarasmiṃ (s2, s3, pts1,
thag20.1:63.2: Sudhammāyaṃ ṭhito sabhaṃ → sudhammāyaṃ abhitosabhaṃ (s2, s3, pts1-2)
thag20.1:70.3: ḍahissasi → dahissasi (bj, pts2) | ḍahissati (s2, s3) | dahissam (pts1)
thag20.1:72.1: Karato te cīyate → karato te miyyate (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | karato cīyate
